text.author: Jackie Vlogs
text.summary: In this vlog entry Jackie puts on a Grecian-style mermaid outfit that her friend Marianne made and has Marianne take photos of her, after which they go to Harry Potter World in Orlando together with a man who is probably Jackie's boyfriend, and they all enjoy and review the rides and food there.
